properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 18 at 4:57AM AKST until February 19 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Wind chills to 55 below occuring. Snow and blowing snow
expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow
accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected. Visibility may be
reduced to one half mile or less at times.

* WHERE...Western Arctic Coast.

* WHEN...Until noon Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will
cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as
low as 55 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10
minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST WEDNESDAY
